sentences.sContent: Definitely more independent corroboration is necessary .
sentences.sCn: 有必要更明确地进一步证实。

sentences.sContent: Yet there is no corroboration of the most intriguing reports, such as an attempt to poison the drinks of NATO troops.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet there is no corroboration of the most intriguing reports, such as an attempt to poison the drinks of NATO troops.
sentences.sCn: 然而对最有趣的报道却没有得到证实，比如，曾有人试图在北约军队的饮料中下毒。

remMethod.val: 来自corroborate (v. 支持； 强化)
